We turn your idea into reality

Do you have an idea for an app? Contact us and we'll create the app and share profits with you!

Send idea

We create the application

Send your idea to us and we'll create the app, take care of financing, design and development.

Service and maintanance

We publish, deploy, take care of support as well as maintanance.

You get part of the profits

You'll get a share of the profits generated by the application.

Apps for all screens

Using the latest technologies and standards we create applications and websites for the web, iOS, Android and Smart Watches, fast.

Smartwatch

Ballet Video Lesson

Mobile application for learning ballet on the go

Ballet exercise videos with live piano music. Each lesson is compiled of total 12-18 exercises. Every lesson contain both Le Barre and Au Milieu exercises. A Ballet Lesson is typical one hour of training.

App Store

Ballet Teacher Companion

Mobile application for learning ballet on the go

Ballet exercise videos with live piano music. Each lesson is compiled of total 12-18 exercises. Every lesson contain both Le Barre and Au Milieu exercises. A Ballet Lesson is typical one hour of training.
